attributes.action: Call for a General Election because UK has been betrayed over Brexit!
attributes.additional_details:
Yet Theresa May and her government plus the opposition have gone against everyone/ constituents 

We are calling for a general election so we can put a real party into parliament who will get on with Brexit .

Since, then Theresa May has tried to put her deal across 3 times and unfortunately have been un-successful! We’ve also realised that when our MP’s voted they never considered there constituents.

Then we’re seeing a second referendum which you can’t overturn as that’s removing democracy.
attributes.background:
In the year 2016 the United Kingdom voted on whether they wanted independence or to remain. By 52% choose to leave and 48% for remain.

Since, that historical vote our electorates have been betrayed especially the 17.4 million plus new supporters.
